ygData.subject: Does this really work?
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw on one messageboard, someone used this trick to check for spawns. Just wondering if this is true... ... to help with ... /guildinvite
ygData.messageBody:
I saw on one messageboard, someone used this trick to check for spawns.
Just wondering if this is true...


>Being a guild officer and had someone tell me of a neat tool that I used
to help with
>finding out who spawned. I would do a:

/guildinvite Hasten_bootstrutter00
/guildinvite Maldyn_the_unkempt00
/guildinvite a_drake00
/guildinvite Brother_zephyl00

>You would receive two different messages that roughly read as follows:
>If not there:
>You can only invite a living character that is currently in the zone.
>If there:
>You can only invite a living character into your guild.
SPECIAL: Go to http://home.pacific.net.sg/~dexterwong/friends.html and send
it to your friends. You'll be suprised how many true friends you have!
